Title: The Troops & Troop-ettes
Writer: Jacques Vilfrid (scenario), Jacques Vilfrid (dialogue), Richard Balducci (characters), Gérard Beytout (story), Jean Girault (story)
Actors: Louis de Funès, Michel Galabru, Maurice Risch, Jacques François
Plot: Cruchot and his gendarmes from Saint-Tropez receive a highly responsible government mission - to ensure the safety of four young beautiful female gendarmes officers. In a few days they begin to be abducted by mysterious villains.
